verses.verse: Whosoever <S%G3956><s%> <S%G4100>believeth<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1080>begotten<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> whosoever3956, 3588 <S%G25>loveth<s%> <S%G3588>him<s%> that <S%G1080>begat<s%> <S%G25>loveth<s%> <S%G3588>him<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> that is <S%G1080>begotten<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

Hereby1722, 5129 we <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> we <S%G25>love<s%> the <S%G5043>children<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G3752>when<s%> we <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5083>do<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1785>commandments<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G26>love<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> we <S%G5083>keep<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1785>commandments<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1785>commandments<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G926>grievous<s%>.

For <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3956>whatsoever<s%> is <S%G1080>begotten<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3528>overcometh<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G3529>victory<s%> that hath <S%G3528>overcome<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%>, even <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>.

And <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> he that <S%G3528>overcometh<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%>, but1487, 3361 he that <S%G4100>believeth<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>?

This <S%G3778><s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> he that <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G5204>water<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%>, even <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>; <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> the <S%G5204>water<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> the <S%G5204>water<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> with the <S%G129>blood<s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> it is1526, 5140 the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> that beareth <S%G3140>witness<s%>, because the Spirit is the <S%G4151>truth<s%>.

For <S%G2532><s%> there <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> who bear <S%G3140>witness<s%>, the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5204>water<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G129>blood<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G1526>agree<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%>.

If <S%G1487><s%> we <S%G2983>receive<s%> the <S%G3141>witness<s%> of <S%G444>men<s%>, the <S%G3141>witness<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3187>greater<s%>: <S%G3754>for<s%> the <S%G3141>witness<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%>, <S%G3739>that<s%> he hath borne <S%G3141>witness<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%>.

He that <S%G4100>believeth<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2192>hath<s%> the <S%G3141>witness<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1438>him<s%>: he that <S%G4100>believeth<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> hath <S%G4160>made<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> a <S%G5583>liar<s%>; <S%G3754>because<s%> he hath <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%> in the <S%G3141>witness<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> hath <S%G3140>borne<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1519>Son<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3141>witness<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> unto <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%>.

He that <S%G2192>hath<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G2192>hath<s%> the <S%G2222>life<s%>; he that <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> the <S%G2222>life<s%>.

These <S%G5023>things<s%> have I <S%G1125>written<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> ye may <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> ye <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%>, even unto you that <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G3954>boldness<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G4314>toward<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%>, <S%G1437>if<s%> we <S%G154>ask<s%> <S%G5100>anything<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2307>will<s%>, he <S%G191>heareth<s%> <S%G2257>us<s%>:

and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> we <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he <S%G191>heareth<s%> <S%G2257>us<s%> <S%G3739>whatsoever<s%> we <S%G154>ask<s%>, we <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> the <S%G155>petitions<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G154>asked<s%> <S%G3844>of<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

If <S%G1437><s%> any <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G264>sinning<s%> a <S%G266>sin<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%>, he shall <S%G154>ask<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> God will <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> for them that <S%G264>sin<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%>. There <S%G2076>is<s%> a <S%G266>sin<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%>: <S%G3756>not<s%> concerning this <S%G3004>do<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> he should make4012, 1565 <S%G2065>request<s%>.
All <S%G3956><s%> <S%G93>unrighteousness<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> there <S%G2076>is<s%> a <S%G266>sin<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%>.

We <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3956>whosoever<s%> is <S%G1080>begotten<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G264>sinneth<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> he that was <S%G1080>begotten<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G5083>keepeth<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> evil <S%G4190>one<s%> <S%G680>toucheth<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>.

We <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> we <S%G2070>are<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G2749>lieth<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the evil <S%G4190>one<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> we <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G2240>come<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> hath <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%> an <S%G1271>understanding<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> we <S%G1097>know<s%> him that is <S%G228>true<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> we <S%G2070>are<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> him that is <S%G228>true<s%>, even <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>. <S%G3778>This<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G228>true<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%>.
My little <S%G5040>children<s%>, <S%G5442>guard<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G1497>idols<s%>. <S%G281>amen<s%>.
